LanguageData.RT_M113_APC_Blueprint.label: M113 APC
LanguageData.RT_M113_APC_Blueprint.description:
An armored troop transport vehicle, common to see in foreign military trade worldwide. Armed with a 12.7 mm machine gun.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1，Passenger x8
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel
